item.description: DSO Project This was an individual design project completed for ELEN90053 Electronic System Design at the University of Melbourne. DSO on the test bench sampling a 20 kHz sine wave. The DSO has a single channel capable of sampling up to 60 MS/s, with a variable-length memory buffer between 2 to 128 KB, software switchable +/- 2.5V, 5V, 12.5V, and 25V input stages with 240VAC protection, and an automatic calibration system.
